objectives: Students will discuss shopping and consumer behavior using Informal/Conversational register language
Students will engage with Sports/Competition themed scenarios related to shopping and consumer behavior
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of informal level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining shopping and consumer behavior content with Sports/Competition narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore shopping and consumer behavior through a Sports/Competition lens using Informal/Conversational language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a competitive sports scenario involving shopping and consumer behavior

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice informal register vocabulary related to shopping and consumer behavior in a sports context
Students engage in sports themed role-play about shopping and consumer behavior using informal register
Students create original sports themed content about shopping and consumer behavior in informal register

discussion_questions: How would you describe shopping and consumer behavior in a Sports/Competition scenario?
What competition or victory might be involved in shopping and consumer behavior?
Can you create a Sports/Competition story about shopping and consumer behavior?
How does shopping and consumer behavior change when viewed through a Sports/Competition perspective?
What informal register expressions would you use to discuss this sports scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Sports/Competition situation involving shopping and consumer behavior
roles: Character A: Using informal register in sports context
Character B: Responding in informal register within sports theme

topic_genre_blend: shopping and consumer behavior with competition
shopping and consumer behavior with victory
shopping and consumer behavior with training

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Informal/Conversational throughout: Friendly, relaxed everyday speech
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Sports/Competition theme: Athletic challenges, competition, teamwork

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Informal/Conversational register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Sports/Competition themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of informal register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
